segments.text: I glance into the kitchen and spot the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing a plate intently, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's on, and suddenly water cascades over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whoa, it's flooding onto the floor in a big puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe's wet, but she keeps working away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, a boy is up on a stool by the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching for the cookie jar, plate in his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool wobbles a bitâ€” that catches me off guard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands below, arm raised expectantly for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a neat garden, all calm and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how unaware they all seem to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the kids to be so bold with their snack raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mix of routine and mishap is oddly captivating.
segments.speaker: PAR
